@slobodansarenac (1/2) Dear Slobodan,
I am sorry to hear about your delayed luggage. We are unable to assist with baggage cases, we kindly ask you to stay in touch with the number on your Lost Report for any updates. You may alternatively check the current status online here

@Ovayonda1 Hi there, we're sorry that you haven't received an answer yet. As all cases are handled individually and due to the high amount of inquiries, you may experience a longer waiting time. We kindly ask for your patience. Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @itskittybabee @lufthansa Hi Kitty, once your bag has arrived in Chicago our colleagues will be in touch. They are doing their best to process each bag as quickly as possible to get it to your address. We apologize for the delay. Best regards, Denis
@latin7610 Hi there, please send us more details (Ticketnumber) via DM. We will take a closer look. Best regards, Denis

@hosperanza_ [2/2]  Please keep all receipts and send it to https://t.co/vmBr0ynoFt 
Best regards, Denis

data.text: @hosperanza_ [1/2] Hi Jake, you can buy the necessary clothes/items for your stay, according to the general regulations, stating that for temporary loss of baggage, 100% for hygienic articles and 50% for clothes that were bought in the meantime, will be indemnified.

@duzdanisaq Hi there, I am sorry to hear about your delayed baggage. When you reported your missing bags you must've received a "PIR" with a contact to reach for updates. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues from the PIR Report for any potential queries. Best regards,Denis

data.text:
@nouchendiaye [2/2] We cherish and love this multicultural climate very much. We will definitely use your feedback to remind our team of our high-quality standards. 
Best regards, Gayle

@nouchendiaye [1/2]Hi there,
We are very sorry for the impression you had. However, we want to emphasize that we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism. We are an internationally operating company and our staff is from all over the world.

@hosperanza_ Hi Jake, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding.  Kind regards, Chris

@evil_ryanprice Hi Ryan, we are sorry to hear you had reason to complain. We adhere to the requirements of the local authorities of the individual country.  In order to submit a complaint please use the following link https://t.co/UOxa5dIBVe. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@Evil_RyanPrice [2/2] Please contact the respective Austrian authorities regarding the current regulations. You can also find more information about international entry restrictions and Covid test requirements via https://t.co/ugM6Xvg5H5
Best regards, Denis

@Evil_RyanPrice [1/2] Hi Ryan, Austrian Airlines comply with the entry regulations specified by the respective national authorities. We as an airline, do not have special Covid requirements, as we are dependent on the instructions of the authorities.

data.text: @sariyahidan Hi Sariyah, it´s not mandatory the have an EU Bank account. Kind regards, Derya

@rajinquest [2/2] Please turn to the contact on your Property Irregularity Report or PIR – you’ve received the Property Irregularity Report at the Lost & Found counter at the airport, it is where all information about your case is collected.  Kind regards, Derya

@rajinquest [1/2]Hi there, we can imagine how inconvenient this must be for you and are truly for this.  Unfortunately, we - the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage.

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @rezarostamirad Hi Reza, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Unfortunately we, the social media team, do not have access to the baggage system and can only ask you one more time to get in touch with the contact on your PIR. Kind regards, Chris

@latin7610 Hi there, We are sorry that you had to wait. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. We can assure you that we are doing everything so that we can quickly offer you our usual service again. Kind regards, Chris

@mayela_r Hi Mayela, On board our flights, the mask requirement has been lifted. If you feel more comfortable "with", you may of course continue to use your mask. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/g8xsDw0IdA Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact

data.text:
@rajinquest Dear raju,
due to the high volume of requests they have received in the last few months, they are currently unable to adhere to on their normal response time.
We kindly ask you for your understanding.
Best regards, Alessandra

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @marsadle @ITAAirways Hi, the responsible company in Heathrow is https://t.co/qW4PxuQDm4 Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: London Heathrow | Global Baggage Solutions Ltd
urls.description: A description of your missing baggage has been entered into our worldwide, computerised, tracking system. You can review the file, if any of this information should be incorrect, please notify us immediately so that we can update your file. Please make sure we have your correct name, address and contact numbers. Once your baggage has been retrieved we will arrange for a courier to deliver it to the address you have given us. Select airport then airline below to access our tracking system. The Process 1)

data.text: @heri5ca Hey there, we
@rajinquest and reunite each passenger with their luggage. Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog. We apologize and appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@rajinquest Hi, I'm sorry to hear your luggage hasn't been delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to our baggage systems. Please be assured that our colleagues know that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag [1/2]

@FlorianHorcicka Hallo Florian, es tut uns sehr leid, dass du noch immer keine Rückmeldung erhalten hast. Bitte schick uns doch die entsprechende Referenznummer in einer DM, damit wir uns das gleich anschauen können. Liebe Grüße, Christiane https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@bentleybrowning Hi Bentley, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@Mayanks53848124 Hi, the Austrian authorities can be contacted via https://t.co/8A2dgtP1C0 Kind regards, Lyndsay
@GSandhu81817131 Hi, we again kindly ask you to get in touch with the lost and found department. Many thanks for your understanding. Kind regards, Funda
@Mayanks53848124 Hi there, for detailed information on the currently valid entry and transit regulations, please contact the responsible authorities directly.  Best regards, Christiane
@MissSmallVoice Hi, thank you for sharing the screenshot. Best regards, Sandra
@Mayanks53848124 Hi there, please double-check your booking code. I can't retrieve a booking with this code. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra

@bentleybrowning [2/2] Unfortunately, there is a considerable backlog which is why it is taking longer than normal. Our colleagues will get in touch with you as soon as they have further information. We do apologize for the inconvenience.
Best regards, Shawn

@bentleybrowning [1/2] Hi Bentley, 
we are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag and reunite passengers with their luggage.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
@MissSmallVoice [2/2]  Would you mind telling us, where you got the other screenshot? Please use the provided link in order to check and covid 19 regulation for future journeys with Austrian Airlines. 
Best regards, Shawn

@MissSmallVoice [1/2] Hi there, 
Thank you for getting in touch. We have checked the information via the following link https://t.co/U0ykpu8yw1 - According to our information it is stated that "All COVID-19 related entry or transit requirements for Austria have been lifted."

@FrauKausNanderP Hello, we’re sincerely sorry to hear that your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social Media Team has no access to any correspondence or claims submitted by you. Please refer to the responsible colleagues from the report for any potential queries. BR, Christiane
@Bokenyakoboke Hello, the correct claim form can be found via the following link: https://t.co/CLg72NPXF9 Best regards, Christiane

data.text: @gattonyan Hi Marco, unfortunately, there is no other contact form to speed up the process. We once again ask you for your patience and are very sorry for the long waiting time. Kind regards, Derya

@ivanroser Hi Ivan, I'm sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you. Please continue to refer to the responsible colleagues for any potential queries or revision requests. Kind regards

@gattonyan Hi, we're sorry we're unable to provide a timescale as some cases require more investigation than others. A member of our Feedback Management Team will be in touch in due course. Best regards, Susi

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @kanak_mishra Hi there, sorry for my late reply. Please send us your booking code so we can take a closer look. Thank you. Best regards, Sandra
@AmnMalhotra Hi Aman, we are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
@iarevej Hi there, Thank you for your kind feedback. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your time with us and we look forward to welcoming you on board again soon. Kind regards, Chris

@ivanroser Hi Iván, if you already sent a mail our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. We kindly ask for your understanding that the processing is taking longer under the current circumstances. Thank you for your continued patience. Kind regards, Chris

@ivanroser @staralliance Hi Ivan, please accept my sincere apologies for any inconvenience caused by the loss of your baggage. Please send an email to our colleagues at centralbaggage.tracing@austrian.com. Kind regards, Derya
@EvertMartin Hi Evert, I just replied to your DM. Best regards, Sandra

@iiref15 Hi Reyouf, we are very sorry to read that your baggage is still missing. Please get in contact with our colleagues via https://t.co/vmBr0ynoFt. We hope your future flights will run out smoother. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Hilfe & Kontakt
urls.description: Sie haben Fragen rund um Ihre Reservierungen, Ihren Flug oder Ihr Gepäck? Kontaktieren Sie uns über unser Kontaktformular.Wir helfen Ihnen gerne weiter.

data.text: @loucas_92 Hi Loucas, we are sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Due to the enormous amount of requests, there are longer waiting times. We appreciate your continued patience. Rest assured that you will receive an answer from our colleagues

@JoseleBernabe [2/2] However, we, Social Media Team, unfortunately, can´t be of help in this case. Please rest assured, that our colleagues are doing their utmost to reunite you with your baggage. Thank you for your continued patience. Kind regards, Derya
@JoseleBernabe [1/2] Hi Josele, we are very sorry for any frustration caused by the delay with your baggage. We can imagine how inconvenient this must be.

@inknn Hallo, es tut uns leid, dass du noch keine Antwort hast. Aufgrund der aktuellen Situation in der Luftfahrtbranche, die unter Engpässen leidet, kommt es zurzeit zu längeren Bearbeitungszeiten. Wir bedauern diese Umstände sehr und bitten um Verständnis! Grüße, Petra

@edeaulx [2/2] They are confronted with a high amount of requests at the moment and this makes it difficult for them to keep the usual average responding time. We appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Petra

@edeaulx [1/2] Hello Adrian, Sorry for the inconvenience caused. Certain events, such as the current situation in the airline industry, which is suffering from shortages, cause longer processing times than usual. Our colleagues will reply to you as soon as possible.

data.text: @Ovayonda1 Hi there, We apologize for any inconvenience caused. However, we ask for your understanding that due to the high volume of requests, it is not possible to process all of them within the usual time limits. Thank you for your patience. Kind regards, Chris

@onecent_ @steph_whittaker Hi there, I´m very sorry for any frustration caused by the length of time taken to solve your issue. Unfortunately, given the increased requests at the moment, the processing time is above average. I can only ask you for your continued patience. Kind regards, Derya

@Christoph191019 Hi Christoph, we are sorry to hear that your request is still pending. I apologize for the long waiting time. Please send us the booking code. We´ll gladly check the process status for you. Kind regards, Derya

@Booseattle @MehrnoushSorou1 Hi Misha, we apologize that the high number of inquiries means longer waiting times to contact our call center. They are doing their best to help each customer as quickly and competently as possible. We kindly ask you to keep trying. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@barreropacios Hi Laura, we are really sorry about your delayed luggage. Please turn to the contact from your missing luggage report. We, the Social Media Team, can unfortunately not assist with tracking missing luggage. We kindly ask for your understanding. Best regards, Petra

@bujupif [2/2]Please refer to the contact on your Passenger Irregularity Report which you will have received at the Lost & Found counter at the airport. There you will find all information about your case. The contact person there will be glad to assist you. Kind regards, Petra

@bujupif [1/2] Hello Fatmir, we are happy to hear that you enjoyed your flight with us. We are sorry to hear your luggage wasn't duly delivered. Unfortunately, the Social media Team has no access to any correspondences or claims submitted by you.

@partalisarah Hi Sarah, we apologize for the frustration caused. Unfortunately, we, the social media team, cannot assist you any further in this case. Please contact our colleagues via https://t.co/OgCdJkz5XM Kind regards, Petra

Kind regards, Petra

@Pearlfdm Hi there, we are really sorry to learn that. Please fill out the form and send all documents and receipts via the follwing form: https://t.co/qQENgdZ6qH Our colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible. Kind regards, Funda

@blatestew Hi Tom, we're sorry that you haven't received your luggage. Please contact the responsible colleagues stated on your missing luggage report. Otherwise, you can contact them via this online form here: https://t.co/gkxxiAghiq Kind regards, Daphne

data.text: @travel_n_me Hi, is your query concerning a future booking or a flight that has already been missed? Kind regards, Lyndsay
@Visionetnerefid Hallo, den Link zum Tracking haben wir dir bereits per PM geschickt. Hier kannst du es nachverfolgen: https://t.co/5a1xgUCD33 Liebe Grüße, Daphne

@lawpolicylurker Hi there, we're sorry for the long waiting time. Please mind that the on-, offload, and sorting process of the luggage is not handled by the airline itself but by a contracted handling agent at the airport. We hope that you didn't need to wait any longer. Kind regards, Daphne
@ivanroser @staralliance Unfortunately, there is currently a considerable backlog. We apologize and appreciate your continued patience. Kind regards, Lyndsay [2/2]

@ivanroser @staralliance Hi Ivan, was your tracking number working before? Please be assured that our colleagues are fully aware that people need their luggage and are working around the clock to process each bag as quickly as they can and reunite each passenger with their luggage. [1/2]
@adrianmucha92 Hi, we have replied to your DM. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@GraceP0WER Hello Grace,
I have checked your reservation and noticed that you have rebooked your tickets to December 30th to January 3rd.
My colleagues are about to reissue the ticket.
Best regards
Alessandra
@Katlin_Holland @airfrance @BabyJogger Hi Katlin, we're sorry that your luggage has been damaged. Please fill out our online form here to report this: https://t.co/eNgixnR1uT Kind regards, Daphne
